means: 用旧了的，陈腐的，平凡的

sentence.Network_en: To use a well-worn cliche, it is packed with information.
sentence.Network_cn: 说得老套一点，其内容翔实。

sentence.Network_en: Before you is a well-worn path of beaten earth.
sentence.Network_cn: 在你面前是一条踩出来的陈年小道。

sentence.Network_en: Most British visitors beat a well-worn path to the same tourist areas of the US.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数英国游客总沿着一条老路线参观相同的美国旅游景点。

well-width 阱宽, well-worn 用旧的, well-worded 措词漂亮的
well-worded 措词漂亮的, well-worn 磨损厉害的, well-worn 用旧的

list.abs: and down the well - worn rows we march ., 穿过沧桑的长廊 , 我们起步.

Jon filled his basin from the flagon of water beside his bed , washed his face and hands , donned a clean set of black woolens , laced up a black leather jerkin , and pulled on a pair of well-worn boots .琼恩拿起床边的水壶，倒满了一脸盆水，洗手洗脸，接着穿上一套干净的黑色毛衣，外面束好一件黑色的无袖皮短上

the effect is easy to observe on a smooth , flat-black material ( eg. poster-painted paper ) , but you can see it on a fingernail or a worn coin as well .在一个光滑的、平而黑的材料上(例如招贴画的纸)容易看到这个效应,但是也可以在指甲上或旧的硬币上看到。
considering her age , she has worn well ., 以她的年纪来说 , 她看上去很年轻.

entry.tran: （话语、主意等）使用过多的,陈腐的,无新意的
entry.def: A well-worn expression, remark, or idea has been used so often that it no longer seems to have much meaning or to be interesting.

example.ex: To use a well-worn cliche, it is packed with information.
example.tran: 说得老套一点，其内容翔实。
迂腐不堪的政党教条和意识形态

entry.tran: （物品）使用很久的;（衣物）穿旧了的
entry.def: A well-worn object or piece of clothing has been worn or used so frequently that it looks rather old and untidy.

means.word_mean: 1. showing signs of much wear or use
2. repeated too often; overfamiliar through overuse;
